articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Venezuela 
    Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) ? General Secretary Kim Jong Il's famous work "Socialism Is a Science" was brought out in booklet by the Cantaclara Publishing House in Venezuela on October 24.
 The work published on November 1, Juche 83 (1994) proves that Korean-style socialism based on the socialist theory of Juche is the most scientific and vital socialism, clarifying the issues of principle in protecting socialism.

articles.content:
12th National Drama Festival Held 
    Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The 12th national drama festival was held here from October 25 till November 2.
 Dramas created by art organizations in Pyongyang and local areas were juried before being put on the stage.    
 Staged during the festival were nearly 20 dramas and narrative art pieces dealing with the greatness and vitality of the Songun policy of the Workers' Party of Korea and truthfully representing the persevering struggle and admirable life style of the Korean people out in the drive to build a great prosperous powerful nation.

articles.title: Anti-U.S., Anti-War Rally in Seoul
Book on Songun Policy Published in S. Korea
Intensified Struggle for Independence against Outside Forces Called for
articles.content:
Book on Songun Policy Published in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the National Alliance of Youth and Students for the Country's Reunification recently published  "Understanding of Songun Policy," a book explaining the Songun policy of leader Kim Jong Il, according to a news report.
 The book consists of Chapter 1 "Emergence of Songun Policy," Chapter 2 "Content and Reality of Songun Policy" and Chapter 3 "Songun Policy and Nation's Destiny."
 Also carried in the book is the article "On Songun Policy of North" which caused quite a sensation when it was published in Internet homepages of south Korea last year.
 The article explains that the Songun policy of the north has a great tradition and meets the demand of the times on the basis of Juche, promotes economic construction and shapes the destiny of the nation while displaying the might of sure victory in the fight against the U.S., has opened the June 15 era and throws bright rays on the future of the nation, builds up the driving force for the gigantic turn in the era of independence, helps win victory with comradeship of Songun and demonstrate inexhaustible might, has an enormous influence on the victory of the movement for independence and democracy of the south Korean society and national reunification, helps defend peace with the strength of justice, makes it possible to defeat imperialism with a steadfast anti-imperialist class stand and pushes forward global independence and helps fully meet the demand of the Juche idea.    
 The book is reportedly on sale in south Korea.

articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets South Korean Party Delegation 
    Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with the delegation of the Democratic Workers' Party of south Korea headed by its Representative Mun Song Hyon at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.
 Present there were Mun Pyong Rok, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party, and officials concerned.

DPRK Footballers to Advance into Quarter-Finals at AFC under-19 Soccer Championship
    Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The DPRK team belonging to Group C of the AFC Under-19 Soccer Championship beat the Iranian team 5:0 and the Tajik team 1:0 and finished runner-up in the league matches to advance into quarter-finals.
